briefTitle: Clinical Performance of a Chlorhexidine Antimicrobial Dressing

interventions.name: Transparent Adhesive Dressing
otherNames: TAD, Polyurethane Dressing, Transparent Membrane Dressing

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Males or Females over 18 years of age
* Patients with an existing, or newly inserted, central venous catheter
* Patients who require the catheter for at least 3 days

Exclusion Criteria:

* Sensitivity to chlorhexidine

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinician Overall Satisfaction With Catheter Securement
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinician Overall Satisfaction with Catheter Securement Five Point Scale: 1 = Very Good, 5= Very Poor

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinician Overall Satisfaction With Dressing
outcomeMeasures.description: Clinician Overall Satisfaction with Dressing Five point scale: 1= Very Good, 5= Very poor

outcomeMeasures.title: Rating of Skin Condition
outcomeMeasures.description: Ratings of skin condition for erythema on a 0 to 3 scale (0 = None, 1=Mild, 2=Moderate, 3=Severe)

commonTop: Elevated WBC, No fever, culture negative
Intermittent confusion existing prior to start
